paragraphs.content: Maschil of David; A Prayer when he was in the cave.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Maschil of David; A Prayer when he was in the cave.

paragraphs.content: I cried unto the LORD with my voice; with my voice unto the LORD did I make my supplication.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I cried unto the Lord with my voice; with my voice unto the Lord did I make my supplication.

paragraphs.content: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.

paragraphs.content: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me.

paragraphs.content: I looked on my right hand, and beheld, but there was no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I looked on my right hand, and beheld, but there was no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.

paragraphs.content: I cried unto thee, O LORD: I said, Thou art my refuge and my portion in the land of the living.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I cried unto thee, O Lord: I said, Thou art my refuge and my portion in the land of the living.

paragraphs.content: Attend unto my cry; for I am brought very low: deliver me from my persecutors; for they are stronger than I.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Attend unto my cry; for I am brought very low: deliver me from my persecutors; for they are stronger than I.

paragraphs.content: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.
